label: Description
value: Portion of a design composed of geometrical shapes enclosing conventionalized flowers and foliage; painted in blue, green, yellow and brown.

label: Description
value: Two tiles each of a similar design, in blue, green and neutral yellow, with fleurs-de-lis at four corners, leaves and two small bunches of grapes; in center of tiles a and b, a pomegranate, of tiles c and d, a large bunch of grapes.

label: Description
value: Painted in blue, green, yellow band brown; tulips, grapes and oranges, with foliage and foliated circles.

label: Description
value: Pink square commemorating the 1893 World's Columbian Exposition in Chicago, an event that celebrated the 400th anniversary of Columbus's arrival in the Americas. Nine medallions have depictions of his arrival as well as Spain's coat-of-arms and the American eagle with a shield flag. The dates 1492 and 1892 appear on either side of the central circular medallion.

label: Description
value: Moulded in low relief, with white, blue, green and brown glazed, forming an octagonal motif, with conventionalized floral and foliate forms.
